name: BaseBound
description:
A tower defence game about defending your base against attacks from tanks and helicopters using cards and turrets.

As the game progresses you need to upgrade your turrets to keep up with the oncoming hoard of tanks and strategically place down cards to defeat as many enemies as you can.

Use mouse to play and number keys to select a card from bottom left of the screen

A much expanded version of my submission to the GMTK game jam.
